price: (25) Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allāh [any] helpers.
arabic: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُواْ فَأُدۡخِلُواْ نَارٗا فَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: mimmā khaṭīātihim ugh'riqū fa-ud'khilū nāran falam yajidū lahum min dūni al-lahi anṣāran
